description: This file defines an API utility function `apiFetch` that simplifies making authenticated API requests in a frontend application. It handles URL prefixing, adds authorization headers, and manages redirection on unauthorized responses.

methods.name: apiFetch(path, { method = 'GET', headers = {}, body, ...rest } = {})
methods.description: Async function that performs fetch with automatic authorization, URL prefixing, and 401 error handling.

ctags.name: apiFetch
ctags.pattern: /^export async function apiFetch(path, { method = 'GET', headers = {}, body, ...rest } = {}) {$/
